rows.label: qst105709_msg0001
rows.name:
I had sworn never to forgive any
evildoers who would harm His Majesty.

rows.label: qst105709_msg0002
rows.name:
Yet somehow...it is difficult
to truly hate a Nopon villain.

rows.label: qst105709_msg0003
rows.name:
Moved by his ties of family
love, were you, Wadatsumi?

rows.label: qst105709_msg0005
rows.name:
Nopon are so tiny and cute
and cuddly. Almost like
His Majesty himself.

rows.label: qst105709_msg0006
rows.name:
Is this person right in head? True
that all Nopon adorable beyond
compare, but this is dirty criminal.

rows.label: qst105709_msg0007
rows.name:
...I will have to leave a whole
page in my journal for this.
